## utils package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Deferred](./utils.deferred.md) | Promise wrapper that allows to manipulate it more easily by making <code>resolve</code> and <code>reject</code> accessible outside the usual callback. |
|  [Subject](./utils.subject.md) | Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getIn(obj, key, defaultValue)](./utils.getin.md) | Allows to get a value deeply in an object without throwing an exception if the path does not exist. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Subscription](./utils.subscription.md) | Callback that will receive Subject values. |
